name: Williams Mckenna Wines
tag_list: wine, ecommerce, search, social, wine-online, red-wine, white-wine, uk
overview:
Wine specifically chosen from around the world by qualified experts. Williams Mckenna Wines is Focused on supplying quality still and sparkling wines in the UK to customers who know what they are looking for at a fair price.

Williams Mckenna has a strong history of providing great value to customers and is moving forward with emerging ecommerce technologies, utilising Search & Social Marketing techniques and working hard to improve the online consumers experience.

As a testament to this hard work Williams Mckenna is being awarded new and larger allocations of the highest quality vintages which can only serve to enhance its customer relationships through a delicious product range.

Communication and service delivery have been a primary focus for the business and will continue to improve in 2013
